system.name: Speed Embodiment
system.effect:
Target: Your Pokémon
Effect: Your Pokémon gains Speed Boost or Vanguard for the remainder of the Scene. Switching does not end this effect. Stat Embodiment may only grant one Ability to a Pokémon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability.
system.prerequisites: 4 Stat Ace Features, Expert Command or Focus
